message.body: Any interest in game night (board,video,or pool) at my house tonight?
I would love to see you - was just thinking yesterday that it's been way too long - but I feel pretty awful. Can I take a rain check?
Sorry to hear. I'll trade you a rain check for an ####### invite. And super excited that MBMN is a go!
I would love to give you an ####### invite but they're still only coming from the developers. If they give me invites the first is yours!
and yeah, I'm really excited about the movie night :-)
